title: SoloQ oh SoloQ
body: Can not wait for soloQ to come out, too bad they pushed it back, flex que is kind of shitty.

replies.body: It's planned to be released today (16th nov). Did they update it somewhere and say they were pushing it back further? And yea, i think majority are now just waiting for Solo/duo Q, esp. with all these Flex q problems.

> [{quoted}](name=4y5tvb8,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xzVsr0lx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-15T21:53:21.790+0000)
>
> It's planned to be released today (16th nov). Did they update it somewhere and say they were pushing it back further? And yea, i think majority are now just waiting for Solo/duo Q, esp. with all these Flex q problems.

Nah, they pushed it back, there is no set date for it to be released, but they claim some time during 6.22 but i am iffy due to last year with them continuously delaying it until it was never released.
The reason it was delayed this time was more than likely due to the issues with Flex, as they had to determine what caused those issues so they could make sure the same didn't happen to solo/duo.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xzVsr0lx,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-11-16T01:15:32.649+0000)
>
> The reason it was delayed this time was more than likely due to the issues with Flex, as they had to determine what caused those issues so they could make sure the same didn't happen to solo/duo.

Yeah nice copy pasta. Same thing is gonna happen as the start of last season.

It was a copy paste from me, from the one other post which asked the same question and therefore had the same answer. The release of solo/duo is confirmed this time around, but obviously Riot wouldn't have released flex if they knew it was going to have such a massive problem, so for the same reason they don't want to release solo/duo if it is going to have that same problem. They need to find the fix first.
I mean flex queue is fine once they fix the MMR issues, the main issue is challengers being placed against silvers.
